column4: hi people, i need some help with a dedicated server running Ubuntu, can anyone help me?
help granted!
thank you gentleman
i have a main ip address, and 3 secondary, how can i use these secondary ips to create shell acounts?
good question
i think so hehe, please if you know some web tutorial or something
you want to offer free shells upon request?
not free, i would like to create them myself
why do you want to use the other IPs?
because i cant like ¨install¨ two apache web servers in one ip address
i would like to listen in port 80 in each ip, or something like that
u were talking to me :(
waiting for me to do what?
to help me, if its not a trouble
...with what?
manage more than one ip address
to create like shell accounts, but i would like to manage them
http://www.google.com/search?q=ubuntu%20multiple%20interfaces
for making new users you'd want useradd or adduser
yes, i already setup the interfaces
